body: Um, What's the punishment for a bump of a post from a long time ago?
body_tagged: Um, What's the punishment for a bump of a post from a long time ago?
title: Question!

replies.body: There's not really a punishment to that unless it's the fact that the player is bumping multiple topics from a long time ago and has no contribution and/or relation to the thread topic itself when bumping them.
replies.body_tagged: There's not really a punishment to that unless it's the fact that the player is bumping multiple topics from a long time ago and has no contribution and/or relation to the thread topic itself when bumping them.
